snippet: A gay rights activist who chronicled her wedding planning and ceremony online was married on Friday in an event that drew largely positive responses on Twitter.
abstract: Marriage of Japanese gay rights activist Koyuki Higashi and her partner at Tokyo Disney Resort marks first time a same-sex marriage is performed at the theme park; Higashi chronicled her wedding planning and ceremony online.
lead_paragraph: A gay rights activist who chronicled her wedding planning and ceremony online was married on Friday in an event that drew largely positive responses on Twitter.

headline.seo: Social Media Embrace Same-Sex Wedding at Tokyo Disneyland
headline.main: Gay Wedding Is Embraced by Disney in Tokyo
headline.print_headline: Gay Wedding Is Embraced By Disney In Tokyo

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
